The sinners sleepe vvherein Christ willing her to arise receiueth but an vntoward answer. By Henoch Clapham. Clapham, Henoch.
148 p.
printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings Majestie, Edinburgh : an. 1596.
Imprimatur below imprint: Cum Priuilegio Regio. Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
